sentences: See on minu vanema Ãµe raamat.
Temaga koos elab tema vanem vend.
context: The word 'vanem' in Estonian means elder or older when used as an adjective, and can also refer to elders (parents) when used as a noun. It's the comparative form of 'vana' meaning old. In its plural form 'vanemad', it specifically refers to parents.
